This entity has no inventory, it cannot be set as deposit location.

gui.occultism.spirit.transporter.tag_fil:
Enter the tags to filter for separated by ";".
E.g.: "forge:ores;*logs*".
Use "*" to match any character, e.g. "*ore*" to match ore tags from any mod. To filter for items, prefix the item id with "item:", E.g.: "item:minecraft:chest".
Clear the text with a right-click.
Do not sync search with JEI.
advancements.occultism.root.title: Occultism
advancements.occultism.familiars.title: Occultism: Friends
advancements.occultism.familiars.descrip: Use a ritual to summon a familiar
advancements.occultism.familiar.bat.desc: Lure a normal bat near your bat familiar
Trap your familiar in a familiar ring
advancements.occultism.familiar.deer.des: Observe when your deer familiar poops demon seed
advancements.occultism.familiar.devil.de: Command your devil familiar to breath fire
advancements.occultism.familiar.dragon_n: Give a gold nugget to your dragon familiar
advancements.occultism.familiar.dragon_r: Let your greedy familiar pick something up while riding a dragon familiar
advancements.occultism.familiar.greedy.d: Let your greedy familiar pick something up for you
advancements.occultism.familiar.root.des: Use a ritual to summon a familiar
advancements.occultism.familiar.mans_bes: Pet your dragon familiar; and play fetch with it
advancements.occultism.familiar.blacksmi: Let your blacksmith familiar upgrade one of your other familiars
advancements.occultism.familiar.guardian: Let your Guardian Familiar die to save yourself
advancements.occultism.familiar.headless: Kill Cthulhu near your Headless Ratman familiar
"Rebuild" your Headless Ratman familiar after he has died
advancements.occultism.familiar.chimera_: Ride on your Chimera familiar when you have fed it enough
advancements.occultism.familiar.goat_det: Give your Chimera familiar a golden apple
advancements.occultism.familiar.shub_nig: The Black Goat of the Woods
Transform your goat familiar into something terrible
advancements.occultism.familiar.shub_cth: Watch Shub Niggurath and Cthulhu hold hands
advancements.occultism.familiar.shub_nig: Let a spawn of Shub Niggurath damage an enemy by exploding
advancements.occultism.familiar.beholder: Let your Beholder familiar attack an enemy
Watch your Beholder familiar eat a spawn of Shub Niggurath
advancements.occultism.familiar.fairy_sa: Let your Fairy familiar save one of your other familiars from certain death
advancements.occultism.familiar.mummy_do: Dodge an attack with the Mummy familiar dodge effect
jei.occultism.ingredient.tallow.descript: Kill animals, such as §2pigs§r, §2cows§r, §2sheep§r, §2horses§r and §2lamas§r with the Butcher Knife to obtain tallow.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherstone.desc: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherworld_sapl: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.otherworld_leav: Primarily found in Otherworld Groves. Only visible while the status §6Third Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.iesnium_ore.des: Found in the nether. Only visible while the status §6Third§r §6Eye§r is active. See §6Dictionary§r §6of§r §6Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.ingredient.raw_iesnium.des: First obtain Iesnium Ore by mining it while the status §6Third§r §6Eye§r is active. Then place down the ore and mine it with any pickaxe to obtain Raw Iesnium.
jei.occultism.ingredient.spirit_fire.des: Throw §6Demon's Dream  Fruit§r to the ground and light it on fire. See §6Dictionary of Spirits§r for more information.
jei.occultism.error.pentacle_not_loaded: The pentacle could not be loaded.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.require_sacrifi: This ritual requires a sacrifice to start. Please refer to the Dictionary of Spirits for detailed instructions.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.require_item_us: This ritual requires to use a specific item to start. Please refer to the Dictionary of Spirits for detailed instructions.
item.occultism.jei_dummy.none.tooltip: This ritual does not create any items.
book.occultism.name: Dictionary of Spirits
book.occultism.landing_text: This book aims to introduce the novice reader to the most common summoning rituals and equip them with a list of spirits and their names. The authors advise caution in the summoning of the listed entities. $(br2)For help or to give feedback please join us in Discord $(l:https://invite.gg/klikli)https://invite.gg/klikli$().
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_dimens: The dimensional matrix is the entry point to a small dimension used for storing items.
Allows miner spirits to enter the mining dimension and bring back resources.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_infuse: These lenses are used to craft spectacles that give thee ability to see beyond the physical world.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_miner_: Summon Djinni Ore Miner into a magic lamp.
Summon Foliot Miner into a magic lamp.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_satche: This satchels allows to store more items than it's size would indicate, making it a practical traveller's companion.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_soul_g: The soul gem allows the temporary storage of living beings.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_famili: The familiar ring allows to store familiars. The ring will apply the familiar effect to the wearer.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_stabil: The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
The storage stabilizer allows to store more items in the dimensional storage accessor.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_stable: The stable wormhole allows access to a dimensional matrix from a remote destination.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.craft_storag: The storage actuator base imprisons a Foliot responsible for interacting with items in a dimensional storage matrix.
The Storage Accessor can be linked to a Storage Actuator to remotely access items.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_oth: Drikwings will provide their owner with limited flight abilities when nearby.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_par: Parrot familiars behave exactly like tamed parrots.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_gre: Greedy familiars pick up items for their master. When stored in a familiar ring, they increase the pickup range (like an item magnet).
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_bat: Bat familiars provide night vision to their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_dee: Deer familiars provide jump boost to their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_cth: The cthulhu familiars provide water breathing to their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_dev: The devil familiars provide fire resistance to their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_dra: The dragon familiars provide increased experience gain to their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_bla: The blacksmith familiars take stone their master mines and uses it to repair equipment.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_gua: The guardian familiars prevent their master's violent demise.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_hea: The headless ratman familiars increase their master's attack damage against enemies of the kind it stole the head from.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_chi: The chimera familiars can be fed to grow in size and gain attack speed and damage. Once big enough, playeres can ride them.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_beh: The beholder familiars highlight nearby entities with a glow effect and shoot laser rays at enemies.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_fai: The fairy familiar keeps other familiars from dying, drains enemies of their life force and heals its master and their familiars.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_mum: The Mummy familiar is a martial arts expert and fights to protect their master.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.possess_ende: The possessed Enderman will always drop at least one ender pearl when killed.
The possessed Endermite drops End Stone.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.possess_skel: The possessed Skeleton is immune to daylight and always drop at least one Skeleton Skull when killed.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.possess_ghas: The possessed Ghast will always drop at least one ghast tear when killed.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_afrit: Summons an bound Afrit that creates rain.
Summons an bound Afrit that creates a thunderstorm.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_djinn: Summons a Djinni that clears the weather.
Summons a Djinni that sets the time to high noon.
The machine operator automatically transfers items between Dimensional Storage Systems and connected Inventories and Machines.
Summons a Djinni that sets the time to midnight.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_folio: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively doubling the metal output.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_djinn: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_afrit: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_marid: The crusher is a spirit summoned to crush ores into dusts, effectively (more than) doubling the metal output. This crusher decays (much) slower than lower tier crushers.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_folio: The lumberjack will harvest trees in it's working area and deposit the dropped items into the specified chest.
The otherstone trader trades normal stone for otherstone.
he otherworld sapling trader trades natural otherworld saplings for stable ones, that can be harvested without the third eye.
The transporter will move all items it can access from one inventory to another, including machines.
The janitor will pick up dropped items and deposit them into a target inventory.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.summon_wild_: Summons an unbound Afrit that can be killed to obtain Afrit Essence
The Wild Hunt consists of Wither Skeletons that are guaranteed to drop Wither Skeleton Skulls, and their minions.
Summons a Drikwing Familiar that can be tamed by anyone, not just the summoner.
Summons a Parrot that can be tamed by anyone, not just the summoner.
ritual.occultism.familiar_beaver.conditi: Not all requirements for this ritual are met.
advancements.occultism.familiar.beaver_w: Let your Beaver familiar chop down a tree
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.familiar_bea: The Beaver familiar provides increased woodcutting speed to their masters and harvests nearby trees when they grow from a sapling.
item.occultism.ritual_dummy.custom_ritua: Used for modpacks as a fallback for custom rituals that do not have their own ritual item.
item.occultism.book_of_calling.message_s: %s will now extract from %s from the side: %s
item.occultism.book_of_calling.message_n: Set a managed machine before setting an extract location %s
